Rulings.Edison: ●“Tuner Capture” targets the Tuner in the opponent’s GY. You can't use “Tuner Capture” on monsters that were treated as Tuners because of “Lightwave Tuning” or similar effects, as they are no longer considered Tuners in the GY.
